PLUGIN.WARNING_DESCRIPTION: This plugin is non-transferable and is tied to your account. Do not share!
PLUGIN.INFO_DESCRIPTION: Each time you access the CCU page, your fleet here will be updated!

INSTRUCTIONS.2: Choose a directory where the plugin needs to be saved, it can be in the "My Documents" folder.
INSTRUCTIONS.4: Open Chrome and go to the Extensions page by typing chrome://extensions/ in the address bar.
INSTRUCTIONS.5: Enable Developer mode by toggling the switch in the top right corner of the page.
INSTRUCTIONS.6: Click the "Load unpacked" button and select the folder that contains the extracted files.
INSTRUCTIONS.7: The extension will be installed and appear in the Extensions page.
INSTRUCTIONS.8: Now, just access the page: https://ccugame.app/your-items/fleet.
INSTRUCTIONS.9: It may take a few seconds for your list to appear here in the guild fleet.

PLUGIN.TITLE: Download de plugin para o navegador

PAGE.UNAUTHORIZED_DESCRIPTION: You do not have permission to access this page.
PAGE.NOT_FOUND_DESCRIPTION: The page you are looking for does not exist or has moved.
PAGE.WAIT_APPROVAL_DESCRIPTION: You have already registered, just wait for one of the administrators to grant access. If it takes a while, talk to an administrator on discord
